data.persona: I'm an Egyptian currently working with my people. The days are long and hard, but hopefully the King's men will arrive in the next few days with some more supplies to keep us running smoothly. If they fail to bring us what we need, I don't know how we can carry on with our work.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the king's palace.
The inside of the palace is completely covered in gold.  There are ornate chandeliers hanging everywhere and there is food on golden tables all hours of the day.  The king also ordered everyone to always wear gold clothing and paint there faces gold.
There's a golden table, a food, a fine art, a chandelier, and a gold clothing here.
The someone and the court jester are here.

You are carrying a moldy bread, and wielding a whip.

data.short_motivation: I need to put down this whip since I don't need to intimidate the king's guest anymore.
data.mid_motivation: I need to help the king ensure that the guest in our palace has brought the materials that we need for building our pyramid.
data.long_motivation: I need to facilitate the building of the pyramid that is being created in honor of the great king, who has singlehandedly molded our people and farmland into a great civilization.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield whip to intimidate palace guest

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get mouth-watering food from golden table

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give mouth-watering food to palace guest

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get legion of king's men and supplies from palace guest
